title: The Bridegroom Nigh
verses: My heart was cold, lukewarm was I, When lo! I heard the Midnight Cry;
It arous'd me up, I look'd within, Be-hold cor-rup-tion, e-cor, sin.

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: References the parable of the ten virgins and the midnight cry announcing Christ's coming
